rules_text:
{2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.
{6}{U}{U}, {T}: Draw four cards.
flavor_text: [i]The Decryption is a branching tree of puzzles all over the Archives. Those that reach an end point must add a new puzzle to the chain.[/i]
notes:
type C
art4

2U, T: Draw a card
6UU, T: Draw four cards.

The Decryption is a branching tree of puzzles all over the Archives. Those that reach an end point must add a new puzzle to the chain.
